data.eml:eml: Systematic revision of the feather mite genus Protolichus Trouessart, 1884 (Astigmata, Pterolichidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mironov, Sergey V., Dabert, Jacek (2010): Systematic revision of the feather mite genus Protolichus Trouessart, 1884 (Astigmata, Pterolichidae). Zootaxa 2526: 1-36, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.196425
